data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aJMRa3xV7gMQ7kNvgGtqQbD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDwKttyFQzImFRConU_XBaWeHQFNS6suHV-d-GwhqXDPQ&oe=664C861C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=c2_Z8mXlllwQ7kNvgHfJn_N&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCrxYqwvHq_L-ATG6ShTct49IvD3ATEWYfsJ_BHz3gQaw&oe=664C8FA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=lhftKk4YkskQ7kNvgEuVkBF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9LbvKzA5RjtcUtz5HrgJ_Terg-j26rcBWjRoHzkbVFw&oe=664C7707)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I8mEHjozjX4Q7kNvgHHERUC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC8rvvDtrIQHKP5UoeuNTmvjYt7D-cF5HfW437bySE63Q&oe=664C69E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qF2WfIRWg2cQ7kNvgH-OFS-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD6BN33pgJ4qdMch-H5rXevDE_Z5KTj0FlCBKQsQsbX_Q&oe=664C9658)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7N-BGGbK6_sQ7kNvgHOBugX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAjvgtQ_QIq3dwrU6xphaThnbKWOX-ugFo16hbc0piaAQ&oe=664C92D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bH39R1FomLsQ7kNvgEGkxsC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAt3HEagJB6BMf2ZZAYmRdADyexT8wc6w7N65HoJkKqWQ&oe=664C78F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6aAVK6OauDsQ7kNvgE_tos4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCxsxjhVqJsdF1d3LJqSrDkVKm_LFkJIXHAtWROYnWz8A&oe=664C636A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Sql4tJXdkT0Q7kNvgFQPxFV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBpByI54d0W1sCj9L7P58j_GeBK6pwku1h51jQIJPr6Vg&oe=664C7717)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=o2g2s4TG--oQ7kNvgEBhXf2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFB4ijYWxJQRfSfykle_uPvk45lIPNIBt84sVfcdXhxQ&oe=664C928C)
